nodes.text: Reridan Reksiss was a male actor. On the eleventh day of the fourth month in 22 BBY, he made an appearance on a talk show called In the Political Pit at 1935.

Reridan Reksiss was mentioned in an issue of the HoloNet News feed, Volume 531, Issue 51, that was published in 2002. The section that referenced the individual, titled "What to Scan," was written by Pablo Hidalgo and Paul Ens. The feed represents an in-universe publication as well, one that was released in 22 BBY.
